cause.description:
My Daughter was in a NICU/PICU for the first 7 weeks of her life..... Her Brain is underdeveloped......But in the long run she will be fine.... I know what it's like for other parents who have hospital bills to pay I've been there done that... this group is to help raise money for those parents....
1. That if an infant is in the hospital no matter what the companies should take there insurance.....
cause.mission: help support parents who don't have enough money to pay infant's hospital bills
cause.name: Hospitalized Infant's
